text:
STRIVR Labs | Menlo Park CA | Onsite | Full Time | Multiple Development Team Positions STRIVR Labs has been successfully training college and professional athletes in VR since 2014. Our company is now expanding to provide training solutions for all enterprises. We've got big players on board and need more talent to help us engineer fantastic training experiences in VR. We are hiring for the following positions: Unity VR developer, 3D Modeler, Web Developer, Backend Developer, Frontend Developer, Data Science programmer

See job descriptions in detail on the Jobs page of our website: strivrlabs.com
